member.name: M:Toolkit.DateTime.DateTimeExtensions.ToAgeString(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Using DateTime.Today, calculates age from given date of birth.
member.returns: Returns age in 'yy year(s), MM month(s) and dd day(s)' format.

member.name: M:Toolkit.DateTime.DateTimeExtensions.ToAgeString(System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Calculates age from given date of birth to given target date.
member.returns: Returns age in 'yy year(s), MM month(s) and dd day(s)' format.

member.name: M:Toolkit.DateTime.DateTimeExtensions.ToAgeString(System.DateTime,System.DateTime,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Calculates age from given date of birth to given target date with different format if required.
member.param: Culture Info for language of the output Currently Tr and EN supported.
member.returns: Returns age in 'yy year(s), MM month(s) and dd day(s)' format.
